MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY3 postcode area of Burntisland , affecting properties in Pleasants Farm and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.12pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.07pm on the 21st February 2021.
